title: After Detroit Debates, it’s now hand-to-hand combat for Democrats
description: New York Times White House Correspondent Annie Karni and Democratic strategist Doug Thornell assess the battlefield with Chuck Todd after the Tuesday and Wednesday Democratic debates.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
